vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
HomeyJar.GetHoneyFromJar (patch_2.sol#12-17) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- Owner.transfer(this.balance) (patch_2.sol#14)
	- msg.sender.transfer(this.balance) (patch_2.sol#15)

solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_2.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (patch_2.sol#1): it allows old versions

Low level call in HomeyJar.Command (patch_2.sol#24-27):
